Author: Luna Astar
Name: SingAlong Plugin
Punchline: Display synchronized lyrics for FFXIV background music.
Description: Automatically detects FFXIV background music and displays synchronized lyrics from LRC files. Features customizable UI with animations, scaling, and transparency. Comes with 15 pre-synced songs including popular tracks like Dragonsong, What Angel Wakes Me, Oblivion, and Rise. Commands: /singalong (toggle lyrics), /singalong settings (open settings).
Changelog: Initial release with 15 synchronized song lyrics, customizable animations and UI, automatic BGM detection, and settings window.
